pkgmetadata.longdescription: A Functional Data Analysis Package for Spatial Single Cell Data // Methods and tools for deriving spatial summary functions from single-cell imaging data and performing functional data analyses. Functions can be applied to other single-cell technologies such as spatial transcriptomics. Functional regression and functional principal component analysis methods are in the 'refund' package https://cran.r-project.org/package=refund while calculation of the spatial summary functions are from the 'spatstat' package https://spatstat.org/.
